text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump We The People want 2 know how U got Dr. Birx 2 just walk that thin edge of truth 4 U about COVID19. Yeah, we noticed. What was the quid pro quo with that one?  A huge donation 2 one of her global immunology interests? Bcuz THAT is YOUR modus operandi.
